name: df-eldisjs
comment: Define the disjoint elementhood relations class, i.e., the disjoint elements class. The element of the disjoint elements class and the disjoint elementhood predicate are the same, that is ` ( A e. ElDisjs <-> ElDisj A ) ` when ` A ` is a set, see ~ eleldisjseldisj . (Contributed by Peter Mazsa, 28-Nov-2022.)
